returns.lowerRatioIncentive: This value represents basis points ratio between  zJTT.totalSupply():zSTT.totalSupply() for maximum rewards.

maxTrancheRatioBIPS().details: This ratio represents the maximum size allowed for junior tranche, relative to senior tranche.      A value of 2,000 represent 20%, thus junior tranche at maximum can be 20% the size of senior tranche.

returns.maxZVEPerJTTMint: This value controls the max $ZVE minted per stablecoin deposited to ZivoeTranches.sol.

returns.minZVEPerJTTMint: This value controls the min $ZVE minted per stablecoin deposited to ZivoeTranches.sol.

params.stablecoin: address of the stablecoin to verify acceptance for.

returns.whitelisted: Will equal "true" if stabeloin is acceptable, and "false" if not.

params.asset: The asset (ERC-20) from which to standardize the amount to WEI.

returns.standardizedAmount: The above amount standardized to 18 decimals.

returns.upperRatioIncentive: This value represents basis points ratio between zJTT.totalSupply():zSTT.totalSupply() for maximum rewards.

DAO().notice: Returns the address of the ZivoeDAO.sol contract.

ITO().notice: Returns the address of the ZivoeITO.sol contract.

ZVE().notice: Returns the address of the ZivoeToken.sol contract.

adjustedSupplies().notice: Returns total circulating supply of zSTT and zJTT, accounting for defaults via markdowns.

stablecoinWhitelist(address).notice: This function will verify if a given stablecoin has been whitelisted for use throughout system (ZVE, YDL).

standardize(uint256,address).notice: Handles WEI standardization of a given asset amount (i.e. 6 decimal precision => 18 decimal precision).

zJTT().notice: Returns the address of the ZivoeTrancheToken.sol ($zJTT) contract.

zSTT().notice: Returns the address of the ZivoeTrancheToken.sol ($zSTT) contract.

documentation.text: @notice Returns the address of the ZivoeToken.sol contract.
@notice Returns the address of the ZivoeITO.sol contract.
@notice Returns the address of the ZivoeDAO.sol contract.
@notice Returns the address of the ZivoeTrancheToken.sol ($zSTT) contract.
@notice Returns the address of the ZivoeTrancheToken.sol ($zJTT) contract.

@notice Returns the "minZVEPerJTTMint" variable.
 @return minZVEPerJTTMint This value controls the min $ZVE minted per stablecoin deposited to ZivoeTranches.sol.

@notice Returns the "maxZVEPerJTTMint" variable.
 @return maxZVEPerJTTMint This value controls the max $ZVE minted per stablecoin deposited to ZivoeTranches.sol.
@dev The ZivoeGlobals contract.
@dev Prevents contract from supporting functionality until unlocked.

@notice Initializes the ZivoeTranches.sol contract.
 @param _GBL The ZivoeGlobals contract.
@notice Permission for owner to call pushToLocker().
@notice Permission for owner to call pullFromLocker().
@notice Permission for owner to call pullFromLockerPartial().
@notice Unlocks this contract for distributions, sets some initial variables.
